title: Introduction to Criminology Online: Simulation-Based Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: No required foundational understanding of criminology concepts
context.additional_context: IPA-Driven Experiential Design: VR/Simulation-Based Crime Scene Analysis & Investigative Process Training

learning_goals: Learners can analyze a virtual crime scene and explain the evidence collection process in three or more stages.
Learners can evaluate response strategies by crime type using an Importance-Performance Analysis (IPA) matrix in a simulated environment.
Learners can identify at least two ethical dilemmas in investigative procedures based on VR case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
